snippet: On the Minute, the New York Police Department suspends its Muslim spying program, new research on “vegetative” patients and Oliver North helping shape the story line of “The Americans.”
abstract: On the Minute, the New York Police Department suspends its Muslim spying program, new research on “vegetative” patients and Oliver North helping shape the story line of “The Americans.”

headline.main: Times Minute | End to Spying on Muslims
headline.kicker: The New York Times News Minute
